title: In Tournament Of Chess Titans, A New Challenger Dominates
teaser: In St. Louis, Mo., an impressive feat is unfolding in the Sinquefield Cup chess tournament: the Italian-American challenger Fabiano Caruana has dominated, winning seven straight matches to open the event. NPR's Arun Rath talks with chess grandmaster and commentator Ben Finegold.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
